text: innum ariyatavarkal kurukirarkal; "allah en nam'mitam pecavillai, melum, namakku en attatci varavillai?" Enru. Ivarkalukku munnar iruntavarkalum ippatiye - ivarkalin corkalaippolave - tan kurinarkal. Ivarkalin itayankal avarkalutaiya itayankalaip ponravaiye tan. Imanil urutiyutaiya makkalukku nam attatcikalai (avarkal manatil patiyumpati) nam niccayamakat telivay vivarittullom
